messages.message: hi all, wanted to update on matthew's bug, it turns out we currently don't preserve ground truth set values if the last run had validation failures. To confirm, we still want to preserve edits if we've finished reviewing?

Ah yep, since we treat reviewed runs (review_status = complete) with validation failures (job_status = stopped_at_checkpoint) as `READY` gt sets, I think it makes sense to expect these reviewed sets with validation failures to have their values preserved
